description: Pair of categorical values used to specify a range in an ordinal reference system (specified by the code space)

codeSpace.description: Name of the dictionary defining an ordered set of values with respect to which the range is expressed (ordinal reference system)

value.description: Value is a pair of tokens separated by a space (if tokens contain spaces, they must be espaced by using XML entities). It is optional, to enable structure to act as a schema for values provided using other encodings
